body:
Hey,
I just need one lengthy-ish dubstep song for my Speed-animating. Non-copyrighted would be even better. And please, no spazzy "wub wubs" Keep it simple-ish.

Thanks!
body_tagged:
Hey,
I just need one lengthy-ish dubstep song for my Speed-animating. Non-copyrighted would be even better. And please, no spazzy "wub wubs" Keep it simple-ish.

Thanks!
title: Dubstep songs?

replies.body:
Anything by Raider is pretty cool.
As long as you credit him, it's free to use.
But you better read his Youtube license before using his songs just in case.

Hope this helps :)
replies.body_tagged:

As long as you credit him, it's free to use.

replies.body: Well, if you want, you can just try to search up Dubstep Megamixes or the likes on YouTube. I normally just listen to those if I am tired of the songs in my iTunes library. That or I listen to the radio.
replies.body_tagged: Well, if you want, you can just try to search up Dubstep Megamixes or the likes on YouTube. I normally just listen to those if I am tired of the songs in my iTunes library. That or I listen to the radio.

replies.body:
Tobu is also a very good music creator.
Although it's not quite dubstep, Tobu still produces amazing songs.

Here's his license

:)

replies.body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BrCKvKXvN2c 
This song is pretty cool. But try to find a different version to avoid copyright issues. <3
